channel.title: Stanford NLP and Deep Learning on Luyao Peng's Blog

item.title: CS224n/assignment3/: RNN/GRU Name Entity Recognition
item.description: This post deals with the name entity recognition task using RNN model. The RNN model for NER Let \(\mathbf{x}_t\) be a one-hot vector for word at time \(t\), define \(\mathbf{E}\in \mathbb{R}^{V\times D}, \mathbf{W}_h \in \mathbb{R}^{H\times H}, \mathbf{W}_e\in \mathbb{R}^{D\times H}, \mathbf{U} \in \mathbb{R}^{H\times (C=5)},\mathbf{b}_1\in \mathbb{R}^{H}, \mathbf{b}_2 \in \mathbb{R}^{C}\), the RNN model to make prediction at time step \(t\) can be expressed as \[\mathbf{e}^t = \mathbf{x}^t\mathbf{E}\\ \mathbf{h}^t = \sigma(\mathbf{h}^{t-1}\mathbf{W}_h + \mathbf{e}^t\mathbf{W}_e+\mathbf{b}_1) \\
